actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain uses of real property acquired by the Architect of the Capitol for use by the Librarian of Congress and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes the special facilities center (previously authorized to be acquired by the Architect of the Capitol) available for use by the Librarian of Congress for: (1) external training; (2) general assembly and education programs of the Library; (3) temporary living quarters and common areas for visiting scholars using the Library's collection or participating in its programs; and (4) such other purposes as may be directed by the Librarian, subject to the approval of the Joint Committee on the Library. Authorizes the Librarian of Congress to establish equitable rates and accept payment for the use of the center by visiting scholars and others authorized under this Act. Establishes in the Treasury a special deposit account in the name of the Librarian of Congress for the deposit of such fees and other appropriated amounts.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain uses of real property acquired by the Architect of the Capitol for use by the Librarian of Congress and for other purposes.
